title: Update contact information with phone and email

requirements.text: Update the phone number in CTAButtons component to 8136009930 for the Call Now button
acceptanceCriteria: Call Now button in CTAButtons component uses tel:+918136009930
Phone link works correctly on mobile devices

requirements.text: Update the WhatsApp number in CTAButtons component to 8136009930
acceptanceCriteria: WhatsApp button uses the number 918136009930 in the wa.me URL
Pre-filled WhatsApp messages open correctly with the new number

requirements.text: Update the phone number in Footer component to display 8136009930
acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays +91 8136009930 as the contact phone number
Phone number is clickable and opens phone dialer on mobile

requirements.text: Update the email address in Footer component to ajayyadavddm@gmail.com
acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays ajayyadavddm@gmail.com as the contact email
Email is clickable and opens default email client with correct recipient

requirements.text: Update the phone number in ContactPage to display 8136009930 in the contact details section
acceptanceCriteria: Contact page shows +91 8136009930 in contact details
Phone number is properly formatted and clickable

requirements.text: Update the email address in ContactPage to display ajayyadavddm@gmail.com in the contact details section
acceptanceCriteria: Contact page shows ajayyadavddm@gmail.com in contact details
Email address is clickable and formatted correctly

requirements.text: Update WhatsApp booking links in ServicesPage to use phone number 8136009930 for all six service categories
acceptanceCriteria: All service category WhatsApp links use 918136009930
Pre-filled service booking messages open correctly with the new number

constraints: Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts
Maintain consistent phone number format (+91 prefix) across all display locations
Preserve existing WhatsApp message templates, only update the phone number
nonGoals: Changing the business name or service areas
Modifying the booking form structure or payment flow
Updating SEO metadata or page descriptions
